case.state: I... am Spooky. You mortals are playing strip poker? I guess that game never gets old.
Wait, me? How's that possible?
Me?... Is that really what I look like...?
Me? How? Who's responsible for this?
Is that me? Did I just discover a new ability of mine?
Is that me?... Well, if you're dead for long enough, you'll try anything...
Nope. I have no idea who you are.
You're a researcher, huh? I could use more of those.
Huh. People aren't usually so happy to see ghosts. It's... kind of nice.
Geez, are trying to wake the dead?
Oh no, it's her.
Oh yeah? And what's so edgy about that?
I'll have you know that nobody invited me. I came on my own.
Huh. This place is nice, I guess, but I prefer my own mansion.
I'm the only woman here, huh? This is going to be a fun match.
I'm the only woman here, huh? How fortunate.
Oh. I was hoping there would be some men playing. Oh well. Ghosts don't have room to be picky.
Oh. I was hoping there would be some men playing. Oh well. I've learned to make do without them.
I... am Spooky. You mortals are playing strip poker? I guess that game never gets old.
Who let Specimen 14 out?... Oh, wait, you're not Specimen 14... ~player~, huh?
I... am Spooky. And you are...?
The name is Spooky. Spooky. There is only one P. Got it?
You know what? I'll take ~cards~.
Hey, you can have these ~cards~.
You can take these ~cards~ cards back.
Take these ~cards~ back, foolish dealer.
All according to plan.
Hey, these are pretty sweet.
And you mortals thought you could beat me.
Good luck beating me this round, mortals.
See? You'll never get a look at my ghostly mysteries.
Ever wonder what a naked ghost looks like? Well, keep wondering.
Ever wonder what a naked ghost looks like? Too bad, you won't be finding out this round.
Hah! Suck it, mortals.
I could've used this a little while ago.
Thought you had me beat? You should know that ghosts just don't stop.
Yeah! Now it's one of you guys' turn to show what you're made of.
Oh no, so sad, looks like you'll just have to wait another round to see some ghostly bits.
Hah! No ghost bits for you!
And you thought you could win.
Gosh, these panties sure are comfortable. I'm glad I'll be keeping them for another round.
Hah! It's gonna be one of you showing your flesh this time.
Guess who's going to be haunting you a little bit longer?
Oh. Would you look at that: I'm staying another round.
Huh? Well, these will have to do.
Well this could be better.
This should be enough.
Hmm. Okay then.
This'll... yeah, this will be fine.
This performance is barely acceptable.
There's always someone who's doing worse than you.
Eh, this'll do.
These are kinda meh.
These... these aren't great.
Well, these should be enough.
As good as can be expected.
This... could be enough?
Okay. This is still going according to plan.
How dare you give me these cards.
You know what? Let's just pretend this isn't my hand.
This is... not great.
This is... unfortunate.
This isn't great. Wait... If I lose I'll have to...
Come on! I can't do anything with these cards.
At this rate, I'll have to show some skin. Er, ectoplasm. Whatever.
I shouldn't be losing. Maybe you guys'll have something worse?
Not again!
This... can't end well for me...
Hey, who keeps giving me these cards?!
Don't give me such bad cards! Some things are not meant for mortal eyes.
It can't get any worse, can it? Of course it can always get worse.
If you guys are rigging this game, I'll find out. I'm a ghost, you know.
Oh well. Not everything you research needs to be nefarious. Sometimes you just need to... research arcade cabinets, or whatever.
Oh, you're alive. Great.
She's alive... Cool.
You can hide, but you can't run.
Hide all you want. It won't change the fact that you're naked.
You won't hear me complaining, Croix.
Sure. Give me the strongest thing you have.
Hang on... Your clothes are alive. Are you wearing a clothing monster, or did you make clothes out of a monster?
Stand? User? What are you talking about? No one's using me. I'm the boss.
Whatever. I'm still not afraid of you.
That's pretty neat. Did you know ghosts can do the same thing?
If I'm a hologram, what's that make you? A cardboard cutout?
A blindfold, huh...? I don't know if that makes it harder or easier to scare you.
A blindfold, huh...? I guess I'm going to have to get creative with my scare tactics.
A blindfold, huh...? I hope you're not used to sudden loud noises, then...
Knife to meet you, Alice!
A hologram, huh? That's pretty much the same thing as a ghost, so you're fine by me.
Yeah, well, whether you believe it or not, I am a ghost.
So what's that big syringe used for? Some pretty scary procedures, I'd bet. Am I right?
Oh, I see how it is. You think you can exorcise me, huh? Well too bad, because that won't work.
Is that a cop?
Well, when you're immortal, you have a lot of time to waste.
A cat girl, huh? You look like you belong in my mansion -- but early on, before any of the actually scary stuff.
Ugh, a love fairy? Couldn't we have gotten a fear fairy instead, or something...?
A vampire, huh...? I suppose that's undead enough. You're fine by me.
Huh. Come to think of it, I don't have a succubus in my mansion. Why don't you come over some time, Morrigan?
Say, Rinkah, aren't you an Oni or something?
What's up with your arms? Are you some kind of lab experiment?
Yeah, well, whatever the case, we both brought weapons to stab people with. You like being alive, and I like hurting people. We're not so different.
Oh, you know, the average amount of knifes... like, thirty or so.
Look, a dead woman's gotta have her hobbies, okay?
I recently started reading some of Stephen King's work. I find it... oddly relatable.
An AI, huh? I wonder how far your programing can reach...
An AI, huh? Know how to hack anything?
I'm just going to warn you now so that you don't waste film or whatever: I don't show up in pictures or videos.
Can we speed this game along? I've got mortals to torment.
You mortals sure do make this game drag on. Good thing I'm immortal and can play this literally forever.
Can we speed this game along? I've got experiments to curate.
Okay, I know I've said stuff about how much time I have, but that didn't mean I wanted this game to take forever.
And then there were two.
Just one mortal stands between me and my victory now.
It's just us now. How about you do me a favor and give up?
It's just us now. Why don't you save us some time and give up?
It's just us now. Nervous yet?
It's down to the two of us. Maybe now you'll actually see something from me?
It's just us now, and I still haven't lost yet. Nervous yet?
Would you look at that. It's down to you and me, and I haven't lost at all yet. Are you nervous?
It's just you and me now. Scared? You should be. I haven't lost yet.
It's, uh... pretty complicated, actually. Let's not linger on that question.
Ha! I'd like to see you try to be me in a fight.
If you're itching for a fight, Ann, you should come over to my mansion. You won't be disappointed.
I'm not a shadow, I'm a ghost. There's a big difference, I'm sure.
I'm not a shadow, I'm a ghost. There's a big difference. Probably.
What? You don't have ghosts at every match? That's discriminatory.
What? You don't have ghosts at every match? That's racist.
Yeah, it must not be normal for you to get invited to play strip poker, huh?
I remember not being taken any more seriously than I am now. That's about it.
You don't say...
Yeah, the scientific explanation is that ghosts are real, and you need to accept that.
Yeah, the scientific explanation is that ghosts are real. Deal with it.
Fake cyst? No, I'm a real, genuine ghost.
Yeah, totally just a costume, and wires, and special lighting to make me look transparent.
You're not dead, Revy. At least, not yet.
Who? No, I am my own doing.
What? No. No one tells Spooky what to do.
Nope. Genuine restless spirit, right here.
Nope. I'm a 100% genuine dead girl.
Like a ghost is any less believable than... whatever you are.
How can this be a costume when I'm floating and transparent?
Yeah, well, the feeling's mutual, Elaine.
Yeah, well, I'm not exactly fond of mortals, so we're even.
Only some people. Everyone you ever knew? Yeah, they're not ghosts, they're gone forever.
Only some people. Your friends and ancestors are likely gone forever, never to be seen again.
That's not how ghosts work. You have to die a tragic death, or be vengeful, or something.
I don't, normally. I just che-- er, felt it was appropriate for this game.
I am not cute! I'm terrifying!
Oh, you know, normal stuff. Researching biosciences to create the most horrifying and vicious creatures possible.
Hologram? No, I'm a real ghost!
Well, if you must know... I got shot by this guy when I tried to scare him...
Is it? I wouldn't know.
Oh, well, it's... Uh... I don't actually know. It just works.
It's... It's not good.
I can only answer one of those questions... Believe it or not, but... I'm a very generous, passionate lover.
Obviously. I'm a master of all things fear.
I am not cute!
Don't call me "cute"!
Call me "cute" again and I'll turn you into a toaster!
Call me "cute" again and I'll mangle you!
Right, you've never seen a dead girl before. Sure.
You've never seen a dead girl before? I'll believe that when pigs fly.
You see through me, but not my clothes. Well, you do, but... never mind. It's complicated.
I'm a ghost? This is the first I'm hearing of this.
Wait, I'm a ghost? How come no one told me until this exact moment?
I'm a ghost? Wow, I'm glad you told me.
Yes, ghosts exist, but don't count on becoming one when you die.
"It" can't feel pain, but "it" can hear you.
I can't feel pain, but I can hear you call me an "it."
"It" can't feel pain, but "it" can hear you and "it" has a gender.
You should feel scared right now. I'm terrifying!
Oh yeah, real clever reference. No one's made that joke before.
Harvested? No, I simply died with unfinished business.
Don't be stupid. Clothes can't be ghosts, they don't have souls.
Are you stupid? Clothes can't be ghosts, they don't have souls.
Nope. I'm really a ghost. Don't believe me? I can show you my corpse.
Oh yes, ghosts are very real. And so are mummies, and vampires, and any other monster you've heard of too.
Yes, I'm a ghost. And you're a cougar. And ~player~ is a mute. Are we done naming things now?
Oh, gee, I wonder why that is? Maybe it's because I'm playing a game here.
Neither are you. You know why? Because we're in the middle of something, that's why.
Are you deaf, blondie? I am real! I! Am! Real!
... Seriously, Jessie, I will murder you.
You're... You're kidding, right? A sheet? That's not a ghost, that's a cheep person's Halloween costume.
Aren't you a monster trainer or something, Misty? Why are you so surprised about a ghost? Don't you have those too?
Me again? But I'm not wear any...
What? Again already?
Are you kidding me? I just apparated this bra.
Are you kidding? You have to be kidding.
So that's how it's gonna be, huh? Alright, fine.
I... I just lost everything in one fell swoop...
And just like that, I've lost my last item...
Whoever's responsible for this is going to die. I'm serious.
Aw. Do I really have to go first? I'm barely wearing anything.
Alright, fine, I wanted to be naked anyway!
So much for my apparated underwear...
Well, if things always went my way, I wouldn't be dead.
Well, if things always went my way, you'd all be de-- uh, down to nothing.
Thought you'd get me down to your level? How thought... ful.
So I finally have to show you the goods?
Well. Congratulations. You made it. I didn't think you'd make it this far, but you got me naked.
Urgh! That didn't take long.
Drat! I thought I could hold out longer.
Well, you've managed to pierce my shroud.
I didn't apparate for fifty years just to lose like this.
What? Again? You people just... Keep on going, don't you?
Oh... Hai. I didn't think you'd make it this far.
Well, this is a bad start.
Oof. Not a good start.
Huh? Already?
And some people say that I'm mean.
You know you're picking on a dead girl, right?
Drat! My facade has been broken! Well, no point in hanging on to the knife, then...
What do you think the knife is for? Knife things! But I'm not wearing much, so now it's just for buffering...
What else would a knife be for? Knife things! Except now, it's just a buffer...
Oh, right, I lost. Uh... I'll just... put my knife down.
How else? I brought it in through the wall, of course.
How else? I made it incorporeal and brought it through the wall. Obviously.
Well, good for you, Xander. Glad things are going well for you right now. No, really.
Glad everything's going well in your life, Xander. No sarcasm here. Really.
The dress does...?
Look, just because I am a ghost doesn't mean I know why, okay?
Wha--? No. That's... No. I'm not doing that with you.
Yes, you can touch me, and I have soft skin, I'll have you know.
The afterlife is the biggest untapped market. And lifeless corpses are one of the biggest wastes of potential.
Nanotech? No, I'm made of echoplasm and stuff!... Touching me is fine, though...
Oh, I, uh, got it from my parents... more or less.
You're damn right I feel good. The cum goes right through me, but I've been told it's a very freeing feeling.
No, you have that right. Makes it easy to slip away after a one-night-stand.
Look, when you get it as little as I do, you just go nuts. I stroke, and suck, and finger, and... I do it all.
Okay, I'll scare you: remember that you and everything you've ever loved will one day be forgotten, and everything you've ever done is meaningless.
Well, I was, but, uh... I think I'd rather stay clothed for a bit longer.
Aw, fine, I'll put the knife down nice and slowly.
Alright, alright, I'll put the knife down carefully, just knock it off with the Robocop shtick.
You have to die a tragic death to become a ghost... Eh, I'm not happy about it, but I'll put the knife down. That's enough for my turn, right?
I, uh... let's not talk about that. How about I put the knife down for my item?
Of course I was! Er... for a buffer. Yeah. Just a buffer.
Aw, fine! But this counts as my item!
Fine, but I'd better get it back later! It's my favorite knife!
I do, that's who!... But I need a buffer, so I'll just... set it down.
Argh, fine, but not because you told me to. I needed a buffer, anyway.
Argh, fine. Not because you told me to, but because I needed a buffer.
What? Fine... but this counts as my turn!
Oh, so you're okay with your nudity being streamed on the internet, but not with my knife, huh? Well fine, I'll put the knife down.
I am not cute! I'm terrifying!
Ghosts don't usually wear a lot of clothes, so, uh, here goes...
That pun was terrible. You should be ashamed.
That's a new one...
(Don't say it, don't say it, don't say it...)
Hologram? Don't you believe in ghosts? I'm real! I'm real, damn it!
The only thing that's fake around here is your jugs! Why don't I show you what real boobs look like?
You know I wasn't trying to surprise you, right? Ugh, why am I bothering? It's like talking to a stone...
You'd better not laugh.
Knife? Oh, uh, you saw that?... Fine, I'll put it down.
Knife? What knife?... Oh, this knife? Fine, I'll put it down.
What? Okay, I'll put down the knife.
Fine, fine, I'll put the knife down.
This is my favorite knife, but... I didn't come here wearing a lot, so I'll just... set it down...
I didn't really think this through...
I... probably should've put on more before coming...
I... kind of just thought I would be kicking butt at this game...
But them's the rules.
I'll admit, this one's my fault...
You'd better not laugh.
Make any jokes about my size and I'll... steal your skin or something!
What, you think I'm afraid of you, Blondie? I doubt you can even hit me.
Yeah, well, I didn't come here in as much as you did, so I'd say it's very fair.
Yeah, sure, all ghosts know each other. Racist.
Yeah, sure, he's in my contact list, right next to Casper and Boo Berry.
... You're kidding, right?...
Yeah, well, it doesn't help that you just called me "adorable." I am not cute.
What? Were you afraid I was going to hurt myself? I'm a ghost. I don't bleed.
Yeah, well, I didn't do it for you, I did it because I'm not wearing much.
Yeah, well, I didn't do it for you, I did it to keep my dress on.
Yeah, well, I didn't do it as a favor for ~player~. I did it to save my own skin. Er, ectoplasm. Whatever.
Yeah, well you're only saying that because you've still got plenty to take off. Just wait until you're a hand away from being naked, and then we'll see who's going to lose.
Big talk coming from someone who was covered in armor at the start of the match.
Big talk coming from someone who's lost more than I have.
Big talk coming from someone who's almost out herself.
Big talk coming from someone's who's already lost.
I could use a real beer, myself... What? I can drink. I've been dead for fifty years!
I could use a real beer, myself... What? Ghost can drink!
Didn't you hear me? I said "don't usually wear a lot of clothes," and we can always just apparate more.
Well, if you can think of a better game to play with ghosts, I'm all ears.
If there's a better game to play with ghosts, I'd certainly like to hear what it is.
I mean, I am making an army of ghosts, but I don't exactly have it down to a science, you know?
Well, maybe not the others, but I certainly will try to kill you later if you don't can it!
Well, maybe not the others, but you are definitely in for some misfortune later!
I am not adorable! You should fear me!
Joke's on you, Streaming-chan, I don't show up on film.

state.text: ... You know I don't show up on camera, right?
Yeah, well besides ghosts and zombies, the living is all this world really has.
Well, I guess I could use more publicity...
What good does insurance do when you've been shot in the head?
Yeah, I owe them more than you know...
I know they were. And ew, no, of course you can't get me pregnant. That's just... ew.
You can do more than hope, you know.
Well, I'm, uh... still researching ghosts, so...
That dread you feel? It's existential dread.

case.state: Oh, you think I don't know how to use a knife? Why don't I prove you wrong, then?
Of course. Just because I'm winning now doesn't mean I'll always be winning.
Of course. The game's not over yet. There's still a chance I could lose.
Of course. I didn't come here with a lot, and I'm not taking any chances.
Yeah, well, ghosts don't wear a lot of clothes, so my knife counts.
Yeah, well, I'm not wearing a lot of clothes, so my knife counts.
I'm not wearing a lot of clothes, so it's more fair if my knife counts.
You know, for a clown, you sure don't seem to want me to have any fun.
Why else would I bring a knife? Why did you bring a sword?
You sure are fixated on this topic.
Of course not. I'm a ghost. Don't you know anything about photographing the undead?
That's my favorite knife, as a matter of fact.
What? You mean because mortals are cowards?
I didn't come here with a lot of clothes, so I'd say it's perfectly fair.
In case you didn't notice, Misato, I'm not even wearing shoes. The knife is fair.
I am not a hologram! Do you hear me?!
Mine was for cutting... other things.
Um, yeah, so was mine. Yep... Cakes...
Huh, funny, I once controlled the body of an annoying angel boy, and you remind me of him.
That's counting as my turn, though.
You'd better be grateful I listened, and that's counting as my turn, too.
Just for that slip up, I'm putting my knife down, and that will be my turn, so now you'll just have to wait another turn to see me take off my dress.
I just like how it feels, okay? It's freeing...
Yeah. Good one. Real clever.
Hilarious.
It's because I'm not a hologram!
No, you're right. Maybe I should consider getting a scarier dress.
Hey, how do you know it's not a hospital gown? For all you know, I could've died from an illness when I was young.
Hey, how do you know it's not a hospital gown? For all you know, that quip could've been very insensitive.
There's a lot of things ghosts can do that you wouldn't expect. Like eating.
Yeah, why do you think ghosts don't wear a lot of clothes? The breeze when you fly feels great.
Maybe you should be quiet, Rinkah.
Yeah, well, not everyone has huge wardrobes to pull from.
Look, it's not my fault I became immortal before they could grow!
I heard that, Natsuki!
Yeah, well, I don't want your hug. So... there!
Yeah, it'd better not be! I'll kill you if you laugh!
Good, because if it was, I'd kill you for laughing.
Has anyone ever told you that you're a terrible liar, Twilight?
Well. There you go. You've seen a naked ghost. You can cross that off your bucket list now. Which is good, because you might not be alive much longer.
Well. There you go. You've seen a naked ghost. You can cross that off your bucket list now. Which is good, because you might not be alive much longer.
Well. There you go. You've seen a naked ghost. You can cross that off your bucket list now. Which is good, because you might be kicking it soon.
Yeah, well, you'd better be creeped out. And you'd better be thankful I put the knife down too.
Dealing with you is a social experiment...
You just don't listen, do you? Maybe you should buy a hearing aid.
That's it, that's what you are. A stone-head. Rock for brains.
You'd better all still find me terrifying.
Whatever. I'm still terrifying even without my knife.
I don't need a knife to scare people, anyway.
Ghosts... don't... usually wear a lot of clothes.
... Good thing I can just apparate some underwear.
I'm just gonna... Yeah...
Mortals... don't normally get to see under my dress... Not in a context in which they'd care about my lack of underwear, anyway...
These are some quality, mature, perfectly acceptable mammaries that command the respect of all who see them.
Are you laughing at me?! Didn't think so.
Well what did you expect fifty year old ghost breasts to look like? Did you expect more cobwebs?
You should be grateful for what I'm showing. Most of the other creatures in my mansion don't even have breasts, you know.
So what if I don't have enough boob for a boobjob? There's other kinds of jobs to give, anyway!
So what if I don't have enough boob for a boobjob? I couldn't give you one even if I did!
Well. There you go. You've seen a naked ghost. You can cross that off your bucket list now. Which is good, because you might not be alive much longer.
Well. There you go. You've seen a naked ghost. You can cross that off your bucket list now. Which is good, because you might be kicking it soon.
What? I might be a bit wet. Just because I'm dead doesn't mean I'm not a woman with needs.
Oh, so you can talk.
Listen, buddy, I've seen a lot of guys like you in my time. You know where they always end up? In a pit of spikes. So cool it with the motivational speechs and boisterousness, okay?
Let me give you a piece of advice, Kamina: in my experience, swagger gets you nowhere. Well, more like it gets you into a pit of spikes. So cut it out, okay?
News flash, buddy, everyone thinks they're the protagonist, up until they find themselves lost in my mansion, if they don't rush forward into a trap door leading to a spike pit first.
I'm serious, you should really drop the act. I can't even count how many "protagonists" have died in my mansion, thinking they'll defeat me or solve some mystery or something.
Aw, come on. Your bits are flapping in the wind. How do you still have hope that you'll win?
About time. That schtick was starting to become older than me, and I'm over fifty.
So what are you hiding, ~name~?
Show us what you're hiding, ~name~.
Let's see what you're hiding, ~name~.
Well? We're waiting, ~name~.
Don't keep us waiting, ~name~.
Well? Let's see some skin, ~name~.
You lost, ~name~. Time to pay up.
Which of you flesh beings lost that hand?
It can't always be me who loses.
Now it's your turn to suffer, ~name~.
Time for some more suffering.
Make it a good one this time, ~name~.
It'd better be a good one this time, ~name~.
Yeah, come on, take it off.
Well then? We're waiting.
Well, it's your turn, ~name~. Don't keep us waiting.
Aw. You lost. Shame.
~name~'s turn? Gosh, that's terrible.
Well, I've taken off everything. Only fair that you do the same.
Hah! You're not invincible.
Give me something good to finger to, ~name~.
Great, now don't disappoint me.
Okay, okay, whip it off, big boy.
It's not so fun when it's your turn to take it off, is it?
Whoa!
Whoa! Rogue bee!
Are you sure about that? People have never needed some kind of artifact to speak to me.
Alright! Cowgirl's opening fire!
What did you have in mind?
Ha, like I haven't seen one of those before.
Whoa! Elaine just got a whole lot cooler all of a sudden!
Alright. I'll bite. Let's see this trick.
Well then? Let's see it.
Ooh, sounds like you have a secret to reveal.

state.text: Gee, if you were taking your shirt off any faster, you'd be ripping it... Say...

case.state: Hurray. Moon lost again. I'm so happy.
Great. It's Moon's turn. Whoopty doo.
Tell me, Revy, are you afraid of death?
What's it like, having arms made of ribbons? Do you even have a sense of touch?
Time for more bullet play.
Ooh, maybe this time, you'll actually hit someone!
Huh. Is it bullet time already?
Oh, nice. Time for more clothes destruction.
Oh, nice. Time for more terror.
So what are you hiding, ~name~?
Show us what you're hiding, ~name~.
Let's see what you're hiding, ~name~.
Well? We're waiting, ~name~.
Don't keep us waiting, ~name~.
Well? Let's see some skin, ~name~.
You lost, ~name~. Time to pay up.

Now it's your turn to suffer, ~name~.
Time for some more suffering.
Make it a good one this time, ~name~.
It'd better be a good one this time, ~name~.
Yeah, come on, take it off.
Well then? We're waiting.
Well, it's your turn, ~name~. Don't keep us waiting.
Aw. You lost. Shame.
~name~'s turn? Gosh, that's terrible.
Well, I've taken off everything. Only fair that you do the same.
Hah! You're not invincible.
Give me something good to finger to, ~name~.
Great, now don't disappoint me.
Okay, okay, whip it off, girl.
It's not so fun when it's your turn to take it off, is it?
Unless, of course, you want to fall into a spike pit. I certainly won't stop you from doing that, if it's what you want.
That's all, huh? Well, I can't complain, considering your situation.
Getting desperate, huh? That's too bad.
Well, I guess you can't give it all away too quickly.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Makes sense, I guess.
I guess your ~clothing~ had to come off eventually. Why not now?
I guess not everyone wants to show off right away.
Fine, fine. Take off your ~clothing~. It won't save you from humiliation, I'm sure.
Hmph. You've still got your ~clothing~ to take off? Good for you.
Oh, your ~clothing~, huh? Great.
You still have your ~clothing~? Wonderful.
Oh, well, good for you for keeping your ~clothing~ this long, ~name~.
Oh. Your ~clothing~.
Would it kill you to pick something else? Because this choice might.
If you know what's good for you, you'll pick something else.
I have a draft going through me, and that's all you're taking off?
Hmph. I had you pegged for a coward, ~name~.
You must think you're real clever, huh?
How very brave of you. Not from what your taking off, but who you're upsetting in the process.
Ahh! That's all you're taking off?
Are you, ah, kidding?
